scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Now, here we go - seems like finding a reliable good guy out there in the world can be quite the quest. Here's that story with some moral for us all: it's Cass Daley with "A Good Man is Hard to Find".

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: Louis Armstrong sings about holding onto that sweet, tender moment - just one kiss before reality sets in. The ache of parting is palpable here as he builds his dreams on the fleeting promise of her lips. And now, straight from Satchmo's trumpet: Louis Armstrong with A Kiss to Build a Dream On!

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: I love how this song captures that longing to be near someone special. There's something so intimate about having "a room with a view" of the one you adore, isn't there? Here's Artie Shaw serenading us all in his smooth way - it's A Room With a View.

scripts.title: Address Unknown
scripts.text: I wonder if this song captures that lonely ache of not knowing where someone is, or even if they're still thinking about you. Here's the smooth harmonies and heartfelt longing in - it's The Ink Spots with their classic tune "Address Unknown".

scripts.title: Ain't Misbehavin'
scripts.text: Fats is really gettin’ down on this one - I mean, listen to those fingers fly across the keys. Is he sayin', though, that you can just do as you please in life and never face consequences? Or maybe it's about embracin' who you are right now without worry 'bout what comes next? Here’s Fats Waller with Ain’t Misbehavin'.

scripts.title: All of Me
scripts.text: You know, sometimes when I listen to a song like this one from Billie Holiday, it makes me wonder about the sacrifices we make for love. What if giving up bits and pieces of ourselves is actually what allows us to stay whole with someone else? Here's Billie Holiday with All of Me.

scripts.title: All Or Nothing At All
scripts.text: Now we're in for a treat as the velvety voice of Billie Holiday fills our airwaves. I wonder, does she mean it when she says half love never appealed? It seems to me this song is about making that all-or-nothing leap into total devotion… Here's Billie Holiday with All Or Nothing At All.

scripts.title: American Patrol
scripts.text: You know, there are some nights when everything just feels…American. The stars shine bright, the breeze is cool and free - it makes you want to stand tall like that iconic statue in New York Harbor. And music like this captures those patriotic feelings perfectly! Here's Glenn Miller with American Patrol.

scripts.title: Another Saturday Night (take)
scripts.text: This next one is a classic feel-good anthem, wondering where all those lost weekend nights went. Here's the great Sam Cooke with his version of "Another Saturday Night".

scripts.title: Anything Goes
scripts.text: Anything goes, indeed! I wonder if that phrase could be the anthem of our time. Here comes Cole Porter with anything going in his iconic tune about living life on your own terms - no rules to bind you down when romance is afloat and morals are tossed aside for fun. Here's Cole Porter with Anything Goes.

scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Ladies and gentlemen of New Vegas, sometimes finding a good man in this wild wasteland can be as elusive as spotting an unscathed ghoul. But don't you worry - we've got the perfect tune for all those lovely ladies out there who are still searching high and low. Here's Cass Daley with A Good Man Is Hard to Find!

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: Louis, you paint such vivid pictures in song. With lyrics like "Give me a kiss before I go" and imagining dreams built upon that tender touch - it just takes your breath away doesn't it? Here's Louis Armstrong with 'A Kiss To Build A Dream On'.

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: The longing in this melody, the yearning lyrics… it paints such an intimate picture of being drawn to someone across walls and windows. This next tune is for all those who've ever gazed longingly at their sweetheart from afar. Artie Shaw with 'A Room With A View'.

scripts.title: Address Unknown
scripts.text: New Vegas, this one goes out to all those who've ever felt a pang of longing for someone beyond reach. I think we can all relate - that ache in your heart when you're separated from the ones closest to it by distance or circumstance. Here's The Ink Spots with Address Unknown.

scripts.title: Ain't Misbehavin'
scripts.text: Listen up, New Vegas! This next number is all about shaking off the blues and living life on your own terms. Who among us can't relate to that feeling of not caring what others think? Here's a masterclass in carefree attitude from Fats Waller with Ain't Misbehavin'.

scripts.title: All of Me
scripts.text: Ladies and gentlemen, New Vegas listeners - the moment I've been saving for you all night is finally here. This tender ballad speaks to me about total devotion… surrendering every part of oneself in love. And that's what makes it so perfect for a special someone listening right now. Here is Billie Holiday with All of Me.

scripts.title: All Or Nothing At All
scripts.text: Ladies and gentlemen, New Vegas listeners - I have just the sultry tune for you on this warm desert evening. Billie Holiday sings of a love that demands total commitment in her rich velvet tones… Half-hearted affections simply won't do when it comes to matters of the heart, as she so poignantly expresses here. Here's Billie Holiday with All Or Nothing At All.

scripts.title: American Patrol
scripts.text: This next tune is a patriotic classic that always gets the blood pumping, just like these New Vegas folks do every day. Here it comes - from Radio New Vegas to you all: Glenn Miller with American Patrol!

scripts.title: Another Saturday Night (take)
scripts.text: As the neon lights of New Vegas' Strip twinkle to life on a warm desert night, I present this soulful tune as you let loose and enjoy another beautiful evening in our lovely wasteland. Here’s Sam Cooke with his smooth rendition of 'Another Saturday Night'.

scripts.title: Anything Goes
scripts.text: Anything goes, indeed! We're breaking free from convention and embracing the wild side tonight on Radio New Vegas. Get ready to set sail for romantic adventures without a care in this world! Here is Cole Porter with his iconic tune - Anything Goes!
